<s> i just want to look round and see if there's anything to be done <\s>
<s> i don't think there's anything except a smell of mice in the dining room that we don't know how to get rid of <\s>
<s> it's funny they should be there and not a crumb since mr <\s>
<s> timothy took to not coming down just before the war <\s>
<s> but they're nasty little things you never know where they'll take you next <\s>
<s> does he leave his bed oh <\s>
<s> yes sir he takes nice exercise between his bed and the window in the morning not to risk a change of air <\s>
<s> and he's quite comfortable in himself has his will out every day regular <\s>
<s> it's a great consolation to him that <\s>
<s> well smither i want to see him if i can in case he has anything to say to me <\s>
<s> smither coloured up above her corsets <\s>
<s> it will be an occasion <\s>
<s> shall i take you round the house sir while i send cook to break it to him <\s>
<s> no you go to him said soames <\s>
<s> i can go round the house by myself <\s>
<s> one could not confess to sentiment before another and soames felt that he was going to be sentimental nosing round those rooms so saturated with the past <\s>
<s> when smither creaking with excitement had left him soames entered the dining room and sniffed <\s>
<s> in his opinion it wasn't mice but incipient wood rot and he examined the panelling <\s>
<s> whether it was worth a coat of paint at timothy's age he was not sure <\s>
<s> the room had always been the most modern in the house and only a faint smile curled soames lips and nostrils <\s>
<s> walls of a rich green surmounted the oak dado a heavy metal chandelier hung by a chain from a ceiling divided by imitation beams <\s>
<s> the pictures had been bought by timothy a bargain one day at jobson's sixty years ago three snyder still lifes two faintly coloured drawings of a boy and a girl rather charming which bore the initials j <\s>
<s> r timothy had always believed they might turn out to be joshua reynolds but soames who admired them had discovered that they were only john robinson and a doubtful morland of a white pony being shod <\s>
<s> deep red plush curtains ten high backed dark mahogany chairs with deep red plush seats a turkey carpet and a mahogany dining table as large as the room was small such was an apartment which soames could remember unchanged in soul or body since he was four years old <\s>
<s> he looked especially at the two drawings and thought i shall buy those at the sale <\s>
<s> from the dining room he passed into timothy's study <\s>
<s> he did not remember ever having been in that room <\s>
<s> it was lined from floor to ceiling with volumes and he looked at them with curiosity <\s>
<s> one wall seemed devoted to educational books which timothy's firm had published two generations back sometimes as many as twenty copies of one book <\s>
<s> soames read their titles and shuddered <\s>
<s> the middle wall had precisely the same books as used to be in the library at his own father's in park lane from which he deduced the fancy that james and his youngest brother had gone out together one day and bought a brace of small libraries <\s>
<s> the third wall he approached with more excitement <\s>
<s> here surely timothy's own taste would be found <\s>
<s> the books were dummies <\s>
<s> the fourth wall was all heavily curtained window <\s>
<s> and turned toward it was a large chair with a mahogany reading stand attached on which a yellowish and folded copy of the times dated july 6 1914 the day timothy first failed to come down as if in preparation for the war seemed waiting for him still <\s>
<s> in a corner stood a large globe of that world never visited by timothy deeply convinced of the unreality of everything but england and permanently upset by the sea on which he had been very sick one sunday afternoon in 1836 out of a pleasure boat off the pier at brighton with juley and hester swithin and hatty chessman all due to swithin who was always taking things into his head and who thank goodness had been sick too <\s>
<s> soames knew all about it having heard the tale fifty times at least from one or other of them <\s>
<s> he went up to the globe and gave it a spin it emitted a faint creak and moved about an inch bringing into his purview a daddy long legs which had died on it in latitude 44 <\s>
<s> and he went out and up the stairs <\s>
<s> on the half landing he stopped before the case of stuffed humming birds which had delighted his childhood <\s>
<s> they looked not a day older suspended on wires above pampas grass <\s>
<s> if the case were opened the birds would not begin to hum but the whole thing would crumble he suspected <\s>
<s> it wouldn't be worth putting that into the sale <\s>
<s> and suddenly he was caught by a memory of aunt ann dear old aunt ann holding him by the hand in front of that case and saying look soamey <\s>
<s> aren't they bright and pretty dear little humming birds <\s>
<s> soames remembered his own answer they don't hum auntie <\s>
<s> he must have been six in a black velveteen suit with a light blue collar he remembered that suit well <\s>
<s> aunt ann with her ringlets and her spidery kind hands and her grave old aquiline smile a fine old lady aunt ann <\s>
<s> he moved on up to the drawing room door <\s>
<s> there on each side of it were the groups of miniatures <\s>
<s> those he would certainly buy in <\s>
<s> the miniatures of his four aunts one of his uncle swithin adolescent and one of his uncle nicholas as a boy <\s>
<s> they had all been painted by a young lady friend of the family at a time 1830 about when miniatures were considered very genteel and lasting too painted as they were on ivory <\s>
<s> many a time had he heard the tale of that young lady very talented my dear she had quite a weakness for swithin and very soon after she went into a consumption and died so like keats we often spoke of it <\s>
<s> well there they were <\s>
<s> ann juley hester susan quite a small child swithin with sky blue eyes pink cheeks yellow curls white waistcoat large as life and nicholas like cupid with an eye on heaven <\s>
<s> now he came to think of it uncle nick had always been rather like that a wonderful man to the last <\s>
<s> yes she must have had talent and miniatures always had a certain back watered cachet of their own little subject to the currents of competition on aesthetic change <\s>
<s> soames opened the drawing room door <\s>
<s> the room was dusted the furniture uncovered the curtains drawn back precisely as if his aunts still dwelt there patiently waiting <\s>
<s> and a thought came to him when timothy died why not <\s>
<s> would it not be almost a duty to preserve this house like carlyle's and put up a tablet and show it <\s>
<s> specimen of mid victorian abode entrance one shilling with catalogue <\s>
<s> after all it was the completest thing and perhaps the deadest in the london of to day <\s>
<s> and the more he thought of that handkerchief the more amazing his luck seemed <\s>
<s> it certainly rhymed with her <\s>
<s> rhythm thronged his head words jostled to be joined together he was on the verge of a poem <\s>
<s> jon remained in this condition for more than half an hour then returned to the house and getting a ladder climbed in at his bedroom window out of sheer exhilaration <\s>
<s> then remembering that the study window was open he went down and shut it first removing the ladder so as to obliterate all traces of his feeling <\s>
<s> the thing was too deep to be revealed to mortal soul even to his mother <\s>
<s> iv the mausoleum there are houses whose souls have passed into the limbo of time leaving their bodies in the limbo of london <\s>
<s> such was not quite the condition of timothy's on the bayswater road for timothy's soul still had one foot in timothy forsyte's body and smither kept the atmosphere unchanging of camphor and port wine and house whose windows are only opened to air it twice a day <\s>
<s> to forsyte imagination that house was now a sort of chinese pill box a series of layers in the last of which was timothy <\s>
<s> one did not reach him or so it was reported by members of the family who out of old time habit or absentmindedness would drive up once in a blue moon and ask after their surviving uncle <\s>
<s> such were francie now quite emancipated from god she frankly avowed atheism euphemia emancipated from old nicholas and winifred dartie from her man of the world <\s>
<s> but after all everybody was emancipated now or said they were perhaps not quite the same thing <\s>
<s> when soames therefore took it on his way to paddington station on the morning after that encounter it was hardly with the expectation of seeing timothy in the flesh <\s>
<s> his heart made a faint demonstration within him while he stood in full south sunlight on the newly whitened doorstep of that little house where four forsytes had once lived and now but one dwelt on like a winter fly the house into which soames had come and out of which he had gone times without number divested of or burdened with fardels of family gossip the house of the old people of another century another age <\s>
<s> the sight of smither still corseted up to the armpits because the new fashion which came in as they were going out about 1903 had never been considered nice by aunts juley and hester brought a pale friendliness to soames lips smither still faithfully arranged to old pattern in every detail an invaluable servant none such left smiling back at him with the words why <\s>
<s> soames after all this time <\s>
<s> and how are you sir <\s>
<s> timothy will be so pleased to know you've been <\s>
<s> he keeps fairly bobbish for his age sir but of course he's a wonderful man <\s>
<s> as i said to mrs <\s>
<s> dartie when she was here last it would please miss forsyte and mrs <\s>
<s> juley and miss hester to see how he relishes a baked apple still <\s>
<s> but he's quite deaf <\s>
<s> and a mercy i always think <\s>
<s> for what we should have done with him in the air raids i don't know <\s>
<s> what did you do with him <\s>
<s> we just left him in his bed and had the bell run down into the cellar so that cook and i could hear him if he rang <\s>
<s> it would never have done to let him know there was a war on <\s>
<s> as i said to cook if mr <\s>
<s> timothy rings they may do what they like i'm going up <\s>

<s> jon remained in this condition for more than half an hour then returned to the house and getting a ladder climbed in at his bedroom window out of sheer exhilaration <\s>
<s> then remembering that the study window was open he went down and shut it first removing the ladder so as to obliterate all traces of his feeling <\s>
<s> the thing was too deep to be revealed to mortal soul even to his mother <\s>
<s> iv the mausoleum there are houses whose souls have passed into the limbo of time leaving their bodies in the limbo of london <\s>
<s> such was not quite the condition of timothy's on the bayswater road for timothy's soul still had one foot in timothy forsyte's body and smither kept the atmosphere unchanging of camphor and port wine and house whose windows are only opened to air it twice a day <\s>
<s> to forsyte imagination that house was now a sort of chinese pill box a series of layers in the last of which was timothy <\s>
<s> one did not reach him or so it was reported by members of the family who out of old time habit or absentmindedness would drive up once in a blue moon and ask after their surviving uncle <\s>
<s> such were francie now quite emancipated from god she frankly avowed atheism euphemia emancipated from old nicholas and winifred dartie from her man of the world <\s>
<s> but after all everybody was emancipated now or said they were perhaps not quite the same thing <\s>
<s> when soames therefore took it on his way to paddington station on the morning after that encounter it was hardly with the expectation of seeing timothy in the flesh <\s>
<s> his heart made a faint demonstration within him while he stood in full south sunlight on the newly whitened doorstep of that little house where four forsytes had once lived and now but one dwelt on like a winter fly the house into which soames had come and out of which he had gone times without number divested of or burdened with fardels of family gossip the house of the old people of another century another age <\s>
<s> the sight of smither still corseted up to the armpits because the new fashion which came in as they were going out about 1903 had never been considered nice by aunts juley and hester brought a pale friendliness to soames lips smither still faithfully arranged to old pattern in every detail an invaluable servant none such left smiling back at him with the words why <\s>
<s> soames after all this time <\s>
<s> and how are you sir <\s>
<s> timothy will be so pleased to know you've been <\s>
<s> he keeps fairly bobbish for his age sir but of course he's a wonderful man <\s>
<s> as i said to mrs <\s>
<s> dartie when she was here last it would please miss forsyte and mrs <\s>
<s> juley and miss hester to see how he relishes a baked apple still <\s>
<s> but he's quite deaf <\s>
<s> and a mercy i always think <\s>
<s> for what we should have done with him in the air raids i don't know <\s>
<s> what did you do with him <\s>
<s> we just left him in his bed and had the bell run down into the cellar so that cook and i could hear him if he rang <\s>
<s> it would never have done to let him know there was a war on <\s>
<s> as i said to cook if mr <\s>
<s> timothy rings they may do what they like i'm going up <\s>
<s> my dear mistresses would have a fit if they could see him ringing and nobody going to him <\s>
<s> but he slept through them all beautiful <\s>
<s> and the one in the daytime he was having his bath <\s>
<s> it was a mercy because he might have noticed the people in the street all looking up he often looks out of the window <\s>
<s> smither was getting garrulous <\s>
<s> i just want to look round and see if there's anything to be done <\s>
<s> i don't think there's anything except a smell of mice in the dining room that we don't know how to get rid of <\s>
<s> it's funny they should be there and not a crumb since mr <\s>
<s> timothy took to not coming down just before the war <\s>
<s> but they're nasty little things you never know where they'll take you next <\s>
<s> does he leave his bed oh <\s>
<s> yes sir he takes nice exercise between his bed and the window in the morning not to risk a change of air <\s>
<s> and he's quite comfortable in himself has his will out every day regular <\s>
<s> it's a great consolation to him that <\s>
<s> well smither i want to see him if i can in case he has anything to say to me <\s>
<s> smither coloured up above her corsets <\s>
<s> it will be an occasion <\s>
<s> shall i take you round the house sir while i send cook to break it to him <\s>
<s> no you go to him said soames <\s>
<s> i can go round the house by myself <\s>
<s> one could not confess to sentiment before another and soames felt that he was going to be sentimental nosing round those rooms so saturated with the past <\s>
<s> when smither creaking with excitement had left him soames entered the dining room and sniffed <\s>
<s> in his opinion it wasn't mice but incipient wood rot and he examined the panelling <\s>
<s> whether it was worth a coat of paint at timothy's age he was not sure <\s>
<s> the room had always been the most modern in the house and only a faint smile curled soames lips and nostrils <\s>
<s> walls of a rich green surmounted the oak dado a heavy metal chandelier hung by a chain from a ceiling divided by imitation beams <\s>
<s> the pictures had been bought by timothy a bargain one day at jobson's sixty years ago three snyder still lifes two faintly coloured drawings of a boy and a girl rather charming which bore the initials j <\s>
<s> r timothy had always believed they might turn out to be joshua reynolds but soames who admired them had discovered that they were only john robinson and a doubtful morland of a white pony being shod <\s>
<s> deep red plush curtains ten high backed dark mahogany chairs with deep red plush seats a turkey carpet and a mahogany dining table as large as the room was small such was an apartment which soames could remember unchanged in soul or body since he was four years old <\s>
<s> he looked especially at the two drawings and thought i shall buy those at the sale <\s>
<s> from the dining room he passed into timothy's study <\s>
<s> he did not remember ever having been in that room <\s>
<s> it was lined from floor to ceiling with volumes and he looked at them with curiosity <\s>
<s> one wall seemed devoted to educational books which timothy's firm had published two generations back sometimes as many as twenty copies of one book <\s>
<s> soames read their titles and shuddered <\s>
<s> the middle wall had precisely the same books as used to be in the library at his own father's in park lane from which he deduced the fancy that james and his youngest brother had gone out together one day and bought a brace of small libraries <\s>
<s> the third wall he approached with more excitement <\s>
<s> here surely timothy's own taste would be found <\s>
<s> the books were dummies <\s>
<s> the fourth wall was all heavily curtained window <\s>
<s> and turned toward it was a large chair with a mahogany reading stand attached on which a yellowish and folded copy of the times dated july 6 1914 the day timothy first failed to come down as if in preparation for the war seemed waiting for him still <\s>
<s> in a corner stood a large globe of that world never visited by timothy deeply convinced of the unreality of everything but england and permanently upset by the sea on which he had been very sick one sunday afternoon in 1836 out of a pleasure boat off the pier at brighton with juley and hester swithin and hatty chessman all due to swithin who was always taking things into his head and who thank goodness had been sick too <\s>
<s> soames knew all about it having heard the tale fifty times at least from one or other of them <\s>
<s> he went up to the globe and gave it a spin it emitted a faint creak and moved about an inch bringing into his purview a daddy long legs which had died on it in latitude 44 <\s>
<s> and he went out and up the stairs <\s>
<s> on the half landing he stopped before the case of stuffed humming birds which had delighted his childhood <\s>
<s> they looked not a day older suspended on wires above pampas grass <\s>
<s> if the case were opened the birds would not begin to hum but the whole thing would crumble he suspected <\s>
<s> it wouldn't be worth putting that into the sale <\s>
<s> and suddenly he was caught by a memory of aunt ann dear old aunt ann holding him by the hand in front of that case and saying look soamey <\s>
<s> aren't they bright and pretty dear little humming birds <\s>
<s> soames remembered his own answer they don't hum auntie <\s>
<s> he must have been six in a black velveteen suit with a light blue collar he remembered that suit well <\s>
<s> aunt ann with her ringlets and her spidery kind hands and her grave old aquiline smile a fine old lady aunt ann <\s>
<s> he moved on up to the drawing room door <\s>
<s> there on each side of it were the groups of miniatures <\s>
<s> those he would certainly buy in <\s>
<s> the miniatures of his four aunts one of his uncle swithin adolescent and one of his uncle nicholas as a boy <\s>
<s> they had all been painted by a young lady friend of the family at a time 1830 about when miniatures were considered very genteel and lasting too painted as they were on ivory <\s>
<s> many a time had he heard the tale of that young lady very talented my dear she had quite a weakness for swithin and very soon after she went into a consumption and died so like keats we often spoke of it <\s>
<s> well there they were <\s>
<s> ann juley hester susan quite a small child swithin with sky blue eyes pink cheeks yellow curls white waistcoat large as life and nicholas like cupid with an eye on heaven <\s>
<s> now he came to think of it uncle nick had always been rather like that a wonderful man to the last <\s>
<s> yes she must have had talent and miniatures always had a certain back watered cachet of their own little subject to the currents of competition on aesthetic change <\s>
<s> soames opened the drawing room door <\s>
<s> the room was dusted the furniture uncovered the curtains drawn back precisely as if his aunts still dwelt there patiently waiting <\s>
<s> and a thought came to him when timothy died why not <\s>
<s> would it not be almost a duty to preserve this house like carlyle's and put up a tablet and show it <\s>
<s> specimen of mid victorian abode entrance one shilling with catalogue <\s>
<s> after all it was the completest thing and perhaps the deadest in the london of to day <\s>
<s> and the more he thought of that handkerchief the more amazing his luck seemed <\s>
<s> it certainly rhymed with her <\s>
<s> rhythm thronged his head words jostled to be joined together he was on the verge of a poem <\s>

<s> in a corner stood a large globe of that world never visited by timothy deeply convinced of the unreality of everything but england and permanently upset by the sea on which he had been very sick one sunday afternoon in 1836 out of a pleasure boat off the pier at brighton with juley and hester swithin and hatty chessman all due to swithin who was always taking things into his head and who thank goodness had been sick too <\s>
<s> soames knew all about it having heard the tale fifty times at least from one or other of them <\s>
<s> he went up to the globe and gave it a spin it emitted a faint creak and moved about an inch bringing into his purview a daddy long legs which had died on it in latitude 44 <\s>
<s> and he went out and up the stairs <\s>
<s> on the half landing he stopped before the case of stuffed humming birds which had delighted his childhood <\s>
<s> they looked not a day older suspended on wires above pampas grass <\s>
<s> if the case were opened the birds would not begin to hum but the whole thing would crumble he suspected <\s>
<s> it wouldn't be worth putting that into the sale <\s>
<s> and suddenly he was caught by a memory of aunt ann dear old aunt ann holding him by the hand in front of that case and saying look soamey <\s>
<s> aren't they bright and pretty dear little humming birds <\s>
<s> soames remembered his own answer they don't hum auntie <\s>
<s> he must have been six in a black velveteen suit with a light blue collar he remembered that suit well <\s>
<s> aunt ann with her ringlets and her spidery kind hands and her grave old aquiline smile a fine old lady aunt ann <\s>
<s> he moved on up to the drawing room door <\s>
<s> there on each side of it were the groups of miniatures <\s>
<s> those he would certainly buy in <\s>
<s> the miniatures of his four aunts one of his uncle swithin adolescent and one of his uncle nicholas as a boy <\s>
<s> they had all been painted by a young lady friend of the family at a time 1830 about when miniatures were considered very genteel and lasting too painted as they were on ivory <\s>
<s> many a time had he heard the tale of that young lady very talented my dear she had quite a weakness for swithin and very soon after she went into a consumption and died so like keats we often spoke of it <\s>
<s> well there they were <\s>
<s> ann juley hester susan quite a small child swithin with sky blue eyes pink cheeks yellow curls white waistcoat large as life and nicholas like cupid with an eye on heaven <\s>
<s> now he came to think of it uncle nick had always been rather like that a wonderful man to the last <\s>
<s> yes she must have had talent and miniatures always had a certain back watered cachet of their own little subject to the currents of competition on aesthetic change <\s>
<s> soames opened the drawing room door <\s>
<s> the room was dusted the furniture uncovered the curtains drawn back precisely as if his aunts still dwelt there patiently waiting <\s>
<s> and a thought came to him when timothy died why not <\s>
<s> would it not be almost a duty to preserve this house like carlyle's and put up a tablet and show it <\s>
<s> specimen of mid victorian abode entrance one shilling with catalogue <\s>
<s> after all it was the completest thing and perhaps the deadest in the london of to day <\s>
<s> and the more he thought of that handkerchief the more amazing his luck seemed <\s>
<s> it certainly rhymed with her <\s>
<s> rhythm thronged his head words jostled to be joined together he was on the verge of a poem <\s>
<s> jon remained in this condition for more than half an hour then returned to the house and getting a ladder climbed in at his bedroom window out of sheer exhilaration <\s>
<s> then remembering that the study window was open he went down and shut it first removing the ladder so as to obliterate all traces of his feeling <\s>
<s> the thing was too deep to be revealed to mortal soul even to his mother <\s>
<s> iv the mausoleum there are houses whose souls have passed into the limbo of time leaving their bodies in the limbo of london <\s>
<s> such was not quite the condition of timothy's on the bayswater road for timothy's soul still had one foot in timothy forsyte's body and smither kept the atmosphere unchanging of camphor and port wine and house whose windows are only opened to air it twice a day <\s>
<s> to forsyte imagination that house was now a sort of chinese pill box a series of layers in the last of which was timothy <\s>
<s> one did not reach him or so it was reported by members of the family who out of old time habit or absentmindedness would drive up once in a blue moon and ask after their surviving uncle <\s>
<s> such were francie now quite emancipated from god she frankly avowed atheism euphemia emancipated from old nicholas and winifred dartie from her man of the world <\s>
<s> but after all everybody was emancipated now or said they were perhaps not quite the same thing <\s>
<s> when soames therefore took it on his way to paddington station on the morning after that encounter it was hardly with the expectation of seeing timothy in the flesh <\s>
<s> his heart made a faint demonstration within him while he stood in full south sunlight on the newly whitened doorstep of that little house where four forsytes had once lived and now but one dwelt on like a winter fly the house into which soames had come and out of which he had gone times without number divested of or burdened with fardels of family gossip the house of the old people of another century another age <\s>
<s> the sight of smither still corseted up to the armpits because the new fashion which came in as they were going out about 1903 had never been considered nice by aunts juley and hester brought a pale friendliness to soames lips smither still faithfully arranged to old pattern in every detail an invaluable servant none such left smiling back at him with the words why <\s>
<s> soames after all this time <\s>
<s> and how are you sir <\s>
<s> timothy will be so pleased to know you've been <\s>
<s> he keeps fairly bobbish for his age sir but of course he's a wonderful man <\s>
<s> as i said to mrs <\s>
<s> dartie when she was here last it would please miss forsyte and mrs <\s>
<s> juley and miss hester to see how he relishes a baked apple still <\s>
<s> but he's quite deaf <\s>
<s> and a mercy i always think <\s>
<s> for what we should have done with him in the air raids i don't know <\s>
<s> what did you do with him <\s>
<s> we just left him in his bed and had the bell run down into the cellar so that cook and i could hear him if he rang <\s>
<s> it would never have done to let him know there was a war on <\s>
<s> as i said to cook if mr <\s>
<s> timothy rings they may do what they like i'm going up <\s>
<s> my dear mistresses would have a fit if they could see him ringing and nobody going to him <\s>
<s> but he slept through them all beautiful <\s>
<s> and the one in the daytime he was having his bath <\s>
<s> it was a mercy because he might have noticed the people in the street all looking up he often looks out of the window <\s>
<s> smither was getting garrulous <\s>
<s> i just want to look round and see if there's anything to be done <\s>
<s> i don't think there's anything except a smell of mice in the dining room that we don't know how to get rid of <\s>
<s> it's funny they should be there and not a crumb since mr <\s>
<s> timothy took to not coming down just before the war <\s>
<s> but they're nasty little things you never know where they'll take you next <\s>
<s> does he leave his bed oh <\s>
<s> yes sir he takes nice exercise between his bed and the window in the morning not to risk a change of air <\s>
<s> and he's quite comfortable in himself has his will out every day regular <\s>
<s> it's a great consolation to him that <\s>
<s> well smither i want to see him if i can in case he has anything to say to me <\s>
<s> smither coloured up above her corsets <\s>
<s> it will be an occasion <\s>
<s> shall i take you round the house sir while i send cook to break it to him <\s>
<s> no you go to him said soames <\s>
<s> i can go round the house by myself <\s>
<s> one could not confess to sentiment before another and soames felt that he was going to be sentimental nosing round those rooms so saturated with the past <\s>
<s> when smither creaking with excitement had left him soames entered the dining room and sniffed <\s>
<s> in his opinion it wasn't mice but incipient wood rot and he examined the panelling <\s>
<s> whether it was worth a coat of paint at timothy's age he was not sure <\s>
<s> the room had always been the most modern in the house and only a faint smile curled soames lips and nostrils <\s>
<s> walls of a rich green surmounted the oak dado a heavy metal chandelier hung by a chain from a ceiling divided by imitation beams <\s>
<s> the pictures had been bought by timothy a bargain one day at jobson's sixty years ago three snyder still lifes two faintly coloured drawings of a boy and a girl rather charming which bore the initials j <\s>
<s> r timothy had always believed they might turn out to be joshua reynolds but soames who admired them had discovered that they were only john robinson and a doubtful morland of a white pony being shod <\s>
<s> deep red plush curtains ten high backed dark mahogany chairs with deep red plush seats a turkey carpet and a mahogany dining table as large as the room was small such was an apartment which soames could remember unchanged in soul or body since he was four years old <\s>
<s> he looked especially at the two drawings and thought i shall buy those at the sale <\s>
<s> from the dining room he passed into timothy's study <\s>
<s> he did not remember ever having been in that room <\s>
<s> it was lined from floor to ceiling with volumes and he looked at them with curiosity <\s>
<s> one wall seemed devoted to educational books which timothy's firm had published two generations back sometimes as many as twenty copies of one book <\s>
<s> soames read their titles and shuddered <\s>
<s> the middle wall had precisely the same books as used to be in the library at his own father's in park lane from which he deduced the fancy that james and his youngest brother had gone out together one day and bought a brace of small libraries <\s>
<s> the third wall he approached with more excitement <\s>
<s> here surely timothy's own taste would be found <\s>
<s> the books were dummies <\s>
<s> the fourth wall was all heavily curtained window <\s>

<s> i just want to look round and see if there's anything to be done <\s>
<s> i don't think there's anything except a smell of mice in the dining room that we don't know how to get rid of <\s>
<s> it's funny they should be there and not a crumb since mr <\s>
<s> timothy took to not coming down just before the war <\s>
<s> but they're nasty little things you never know where they'll take you next <\s>
<s> does he leave his bed oh <\s>
<s> yes sir he takes nice exercise between his bed and the window in the morning not to risk a change of air <\s>
<s> and he's quite comfortable in himself has his will out every day regular <\s>
<s> it's a great consolation to him that <\s>
<s> well smither i want to see him if i can in case he has anything to say to me <\s>
<s> smither coloured up above her corsets <\s>
<s> it will be an occasion <\s>
<s> shall i take you round the house sir while i send cook to break it to him <\s>
<s> no you go to him said soames <\s>
<s> i can go round the house by myself <\s>
<s> one could not confess to sentiment before another and soames felt that he was going to be sentimental nosing round those rooms so saturated with the past <\s>
<s> when smither creaking with excitement had left him soames entered the dining room and sniffed <\s>
<s> in his opinion it wasn't mice but incipient wood rot and he examined the panelling <\s>
<s> whether it was worth a coat of paint at timothy's age he was not sure <\s>
<s> the room had always been the most modern in the house and only a faint smile curled soames lips and nostrils <\s>
<s> walls of a rich green surmounted the oak dado a heavy metal chandelier hung by a chain from a ceiling divided by imitation beams <\s>
<s> the pictures had been bought by timothy a bargain one day at jobson's sixty years ago three snyder still lifes two faintly coloured drawings of a boy and a girl rather charming which bore the initials j <\s>
<s> r timothy had always believed they might turn out to be joshua reynolds but soames who admired them had discovered that they were only john robinson and a doubtful morland of a white pony being shod <\s>
<s> deep red plush curtains ten high backed dark mahogany chairs with deep red plush seats a turkey carpet and a mahogany dining table as large as the room was small such was an apartment which soames could remember unchanged in soul or body since he was four years old <\s>
<s> he looked especially at the two drawings and thought i shall buy those at the sale <\s>
<s> from the dining room he passed into timothy's study <\s>
<s> he did not remember ever having been in that room <\s>
<s> it was lined from floor to ceiling with volumes and he looked at them with curiosity <\s>
<s> one wall seemed devoted to educational books which timothy's firm had published two generations back sometimes as many as twenty copies of one book <\s>
<s> soames read their titles and shuddered <\s>
<s> the middle wall had precisely the same books as used to be in the library at his own father's in park lane from which he deduced the fancy that james and his youngest brother had gone out together one day and bought a brace of small libraries <\s>
<s> the third wall he approached with more excitement <\s>
<s> here surely timothy's own taste would be found <\s>
<s> the books were dummies <\s>
<s> the fourth wall was all heavily curtained window <\s>
<s> and turned toward it was a large chair with a mahogany reading stand attached on which a yellowish and folded copy of the times dated july 6 1914 the day timothy first failed to come down as if in preparation for the war seemed waiting for him still <\s>
<s> in a corner stood a large globe of that world never visited by timothy deeply convinced of the unreality of everything but england and permanently upset by the sea on which he had been very sick one sunday afternoon in 1836 out of a pleasure boat off the pier at brighton with juley and hester swithin and hatty chessman all due to swithin who was always taking things into his head and who thank goodness had been sick too <\s>
<s> soames knew all about it having heard the tale fifty times at least from one or other of them <\s>
<s> he went up to the globe and gave it a spin it emitted a faint creak and moved about an inch bringing into his purview a daddy long legs which had died on it in latitude 44 <\s>
<s> and he went out and up the stairs <\s>
<s> on the half landing he stopped before the case of stuffed humming birds which had delighted his childhood <\s>
<s> they looked not a day older suspended on wires above pampas grass <\s>
<s> if the case were opened the birds would not begin to hum but the whole thing would crumble he suspected <\s>
<s> it wouldn't be worth putting that into the sale <\s>
<s> and suddenly he was caught by a memory of aunt ann dear old aunt ann holding him by the hand in front of that case and saying look soamey <\s>
<s> aren't they bright and pretty dear little humming birds <\s>
<s> soames remembered his own answer they don't hum auntie <\s>
<s> he must have been six in a black velveteen suit with a light blue collar he remembered that suit well <\s>
<s> aunt ann with her ringlets and her spidery kind hands and her grave old aquiline smile a fine old lady aunt ann <\s>
<s> he moved on up to the drawing room door <\s>
<s> there on each side of it were the groups of miniatures <\s>
<s> those he would certainly buy in <\s>
<s> the miniatures of his four aunts one of his uncle swithin adolescent and one of his uncle nicholas as a boy <\s>
<s> they had all been painted by a young lady friend of the family at a time 1830 about when miniatures were considered very genteel and lasting too painted as they were on ivory <\s>
<s> many a time had he heard the tale of that young lady very talented my dear she had quite a weakness for swithin and very soon after she went into a consumption and died so like keats we often spoke of it <\s>
<s> well there they were <\s>
<s> ann juley hester susan quite a small child swithin with sky blue eyes pink cheeks yellow curls white waistcoat large as life and nicholas like cupid with an eye on heaven <\s>
<s> now he came to think of it uncle nick had always been rather like that a wonderful man to the last <\s>
<s> yes she must have had talent and miniatures always had a certain back watered cachet of their own little subject to the currents of competition on aesthetic change <\s>
<s> soames opened the drawing room door <\s>
<s> the room was dusted the furniture uncovered the curtains drawn back precisely as if his aunts still dwelt there patiently waiting <\s>
<s> and a thought came to him when timothy died why not <\s>
<s> would it not be almost a duty to preserve this house like carlyle's and put up a tablet and show it <\s>
<s> specimen of mid victorian abode entrance one shilling with catalogue <\s>
<s> after all it was the completest thing and perhaps the deadest in the london of to day <\s>
<s> and the more he thought of that handkerchief the more amazing his luck seemed <\s>
<s> it certainly rhymed with her <\s>
<s> rhythm thronged his head words jostled to be joined together he was on the verge of a poem <\s>
<s> jon remained in this condition for more than half an hour then returned to the house and getting a ladder climbed in at his bedroom window out of sheer exhilaration <\s>
<s> then remembering that the study window was open he went down and shut it first removing the ladder so as to obliterate all traces of his feeling <\s>
<s> the thing was too deep to be revealed to mortal soul even to his mother <\s>
<s> iv the mausoleum there are houses whose souls have passed into the limbo of time leaving their bodies in the limbo of london <\s>
<s> such was not quite the condition of timothy's on the bayswater road for timothy's soul still had one foot in timothy forsyte's body and smither kept the atmosphere unchanging of camphor and port wine and house whose windows are only opened to air it twice a day <\s>
<s> to forsyte imagination that house was now a sort of chinese pill box a series of layers in the last of which was timothy <\s>
<s> one did not reach him or so it was reported by members of the family who out of old time habit or absentmindedness would drive up once in a blue moon and ask after their surviving uncle <\s>
<s> such were francie now quite emancipated from god she frankly avowed atheism euphemia emancipated from old nicholas and winifred dartie from her man of the world <\s>
<s> but after all everybody was emancipated now or said they were perhaps not quite the same thing <\s>
<s> when soames therefore took it on his way to paddington station on the morning after that encounter it was hardly with the expectation of seeing timothy in the flesh <\s>
<s> his heart made a faint demonstration within him while he stood in full south sunlight on the newly whitened doorstep of that little house where four forsytes had once lived and now but one dwelt on like a winter fly the house into which soames had come and out of which he had gone times without number divested of or burdened with fardels of family gossip the house of the old people of another century another age <\s>
<s> the sight of smither still corseted up to the armpits because the new fashion which came in as they were going out about 1903 had never been considered nice by aunts juley and hester brought a pale friendliness to soames lips smither still faithfully arranged to old pattern in every detail an invaluable servant none such left smiling back at him with the words why <\s>
<s> soames after all this time <\s>
<s> and how are you sir <\s>
<s> timothy will be so pleased to know you've been <\s>
<s> he keeps fairly bobbish for his age sir but of course he's a wonderful man <\s>
<s> as i said to mrs <\s>
<s> dartie when she was here last it would please miss forsyte and mrs <\s>
<s> juley and miss hester to see how he relishes a baked apple still <\s>
<s> but he's quite deaf <\s>
<s> and a mercy i always think <\s>
<s> for what we should have done with him in the air raids i don't know <\s>
<s> what did you do with him <\s>
<s> we just left him in his bed and had the bell run down into the cellar so that cook and i could hear him if he rang <\s>
<s> it would never have done to let him know there was a war on <\s>
<s> as i said to cook if mr <\s>
<s> timothy rings they may do what they like i'm going up <\s>

<s> jon remained in this condition for more than half an hour then returned to the house and getting a ladder climbed in at his bedroom window out of sheer exhilaration <\s>
<s> then remembering that the study window was open he went down and shut it first removing the ladder so as to obliterate all traces of his feeling <\s>
<s> the thing was too deep to be revealed to mortal soul even to his mother <\s>
<s> iv the mausoleum there are houses whose souls have passed into the limbo of time leaving their bodies in the limbo of london <\s>
<s> such was not quite the condition of timothy's on the bayswater road for timothy's soul still had one foot in timothy forsyte's body and smither kept the atmosphere unchanging of camphor and port wine and house whose windows are only opened to air it twice a day <\s>
<s> to forsyte imagination that house was now a sort of chinese pill box a series of layers in the last of which was timothy <\s>
<s> one did not reach him or so it was reported by members of the family who out of old time habit or absentmindedness would drive up once in a blue moon and ask after their surviving uncle <\s>
<s> such were francie now quite emancipated from god she frankly avowed atheism euphemia emancipated from old nicholas and winifred dartie from her man of the world <\s>
<s> but after all everybody was emancipated now or said they were perhaps not quite the same thing <\s>
<s> when soames therefore took it on his way to paddington station on the morning after that encounter it was hardly with the expectation of seeing timothy in the flesh <\s>
<s> his heart made a faint demonstration within him while he stood in full south sunlight on the newly whitened doorstep of that little house where four forsytes had once lived and now but one dwelt on like a winter fly the house into which soames had come and out of which he had gone times without number divested of or burdened with fardels of family gossip the house of the old people of another century another age <\s>
<s> the sight of smither still corseted up to the armpits because the new fashion which came in as they were going out about 1903 had never been considered nice by aunts juley and hester brought a pale friendliness to soames lips smither still faithfully arranged to old pattern in every detail an invaluable servant none such left smiling back at him with the words why <\s>
<s> soames after all this time <\s>
<s> and how are you sir <\s>
<s> timothy will be so pleased to know you've been <\s>
<s> he keeps fairly bobbish for his age sir but of course he's a wonderful man <\s>
<s> as i said to mrs <\s>
<s> dartie when she was here last it would please miss forsyte and mrs <\s>
<s> juley and miss hester to see how he relishes a baked apple still <\s>
<s> but he's quite deaf <\s>
<s> and a mercy i always think <\s>
<s> for what we should have done with him in the air raids i don't know <\s>
<s> what did you do with him <\s>
<s> we just left him in his bed and had the bell run down into the cellar so that cook and i could hear him if he rang <\s>
<s> it would never have done to let him know there was a war on <\s>
<s> as i said to cook if mr <\s>
<s> timothy rings they may do what they like i'm going up <\s>
<s> my dear mistresses would have a fit if they could see him ringing and nobody going to him <\s>
<s> but he slept through them all beautiful <\s>
<s> and the one in the daytime he was having his bath <\s>
<s> it was a mercy because he might have noticed the people in the street all looking up he often looks out of the window <\s>
<s> smither was getting garrulous <\s>
<s> i just want to look round and see if there's anything to be done <\s>
<s> i don't think there's anything except a smell of mice in the dining room that we don't know how to get rid of <\s>
<s> it's funny they should be there and not a crumb since mr <\s>
<s> timothy took to not coming down just before the war <\s>
<s> but they're nasty little things you never know where they'll take you next <\s>
<s> does he leave his bed oh <\s>
<s> yes sir he takes nice exercise between his bed and the window in the morning not to risk a change of air <\s>
<s> and he's quite comfortable in himself has his will out every day regular <\s>
<s> it's a great consolation to him that <\s>
<s> well smither i want to see him if i can in case he has anything to say to me <\s>
<s> smither coloured up above her corsets <\s>
<s> it will be an occasion <\s>
<s> shall i take you round the house sir while i send cook to break it to him <\s>
<s> no you go to him said soames <\s>
<s> i can go round the house by myself <\s>
<s> one could not confess to sentiment before another and soames felt that he was going to be sentimental nosing round those rooms so saturated with the past <\s>
<s> when smither creaking with excitement had left him soames entered the dining room and sniffed <\s>
<s> in his opinion it wasn't mice but incipient wood rot and he examined the panelling <\s>
<s> whether it was worth a coat of paint at timothy's age he was not sure <\s>
<s> the room had always been the most modern in the house and only a faint smile curled soames lips and nostrils <\s>
<s> walls of a rich green surmounted the oak dado a heavy metal chandelier hung by a chain from a ceiling divided by imitation beams <\s>
<s> the pictures had been bought by timothy a bargain one day at jobson's sixty years ago three snyder still lifes two faintly coloured drawings of a boy and a girl rather charming which bore the initials j <\s>
<s> r timothy had always believed they might turn out to be joshua reynolds but soames who admired them had discovered that they were only john robinson and a doubtful morland of a white pony being shod <\s>
<s> deep red plush curtains ten high backed dark mahogany chairs with deep red plush seats a turkey carpet and a mahogany dining table as large as the room was small such was an apartment which soames could remember unchanged in soul or body since he was four years old <\s>
<s> he looked especially at the two drawings and thought i shall buy those at the sale <\s>
<s> from the dining room he passed into timothy's study <\s>
<s> he did not remember ever having been in that room <\s>
<s> it was lined from floor to ceiling with volumes and he looked at them with curiosity <\s>
<s> one wall seemed devoted to educational books which timothy's firm had published two generations back sometimes as many as twenty copies of one book <\s>
<s> soames read their titles and shuddered <\s>
<s> the middle wall had precisely the same books as used to be in the library at his own father's in park lane from which he deduced the fancy that james and his youngest brother had gone out together one day and bought a brace of small libraries <\s>
<s> the third wall he approached with more excitement <\s>
<s> here surely timothy's own taste would be found <\s>
<s> the books were dummies <\s>
<s> the fourth wall was all heavily curtained window <\s>
<s> and turned toward it was a large chair with a mahogany reading stand attached on which a yellowish and folded copy of the times dated july 6 1914 the day timothy first failed to come down as if in preparation for the war seemed waiting for him still <\s>
<s> in a corner stood a large globe of that world never visited by timothy deeply convinced of the unreality of everything but england and permanently upset by the sea on which he had been very sick one sunday afternoon in 1836 out of a pleasure boat off the pier at brighton with juley and hester swithin and hatty chessman all due to swithin who was always taking things into his head and who thank goodness had been sick too <\s>
<s> soames knew all about it having heard the tale fifty times at least from one or other of them <\s>
<s> he went up to the globe and gave it a spin it emitted a faint creak and moved about an inch bringing into his purview a daddy long legs which had died on it in latitude 44 <\s>
<s> and he went out and up the stairs <\s>
<s> on the half landing he stopped before the case of stuffed humming birds which had delighted his childhood <\s>
<s> they looked not a day older suspended on wires above pampas grass <\s>
<s> if the case were opened the birds would not begin to hum but the whole thing would crumble he suspected <\s>
<s> it wouldn't be worth putting that into the sale <\s>
<s> and suddenly he was caught by a memory of aunt ann dear old aunt ann holding him by the hand in front of that case and saying look soamey <\s>
<s> aren't they bright and pretty dear little humming birds <\s>
<s> soames remembered his own answer they don't hum auntie <\s>
<s> he must have been six in a black velveteen suit with a light blue collar he remembered that suit well <\s>
<s> aunt ann with her ringlets and her spidery kind hands and her grave old aquiline smile a fine old lady aunt ann <\s>
<s> he moved on up to the drawing room door <\s>
<s> there on each side of it were the groups of miniatures <\s>
<s> those he would certainly buy in <\s>
<s> the miniatures of his four aunts one of his uncle swithin adolescent and one of his uncle nicholas as a boy <\s>
<s> they had all been painted by a young lady friend of the family at a time 1830 about when miniatures were considered very genteel and lasting too painted as they were on ivory <\s>
<s> many a time had he heard the tale of that young lady very talented my dear she had quite a weakness for swithin and very soon after she went into a consumption and died so like keats we often spoke of it <\s>
<s> well there they were <\s>
<s> ann juley hester susan quite a small child swithin with sky blue eyes pink cheeks yellow curls white waistcoat large as life and nicholas like cupid with an eye on heaven <\s>
<s> now he came to think of it uncle nick had always been rather like that a wonderful man to the last <\s>
<s> yes she must have had talent and miniatures always had a certain back watered cachet of their own little subject to the currents of competition on aesthetic change <\s>
<s> soames opened the drawing room door <\s>
<s> the room was dusted the furniture uncovered the curtains drawn back precisely as if his aunts still dwelt there patiently waiting <\s>
<s> and a thought came to him when timothy died why not <\s>
<s> would it not be almost a duty to preserve this house like carlyle's and put up a tablet and show it <\s>
<s> specimen of mid victorian abode entrance one shilling with catalogue <\s>
<s> after all it was the completest thing and perhaps the deadest in the london of to day <\s>
<s> and the more he thought of that handkerchief the more amazing his luck seemed <\s>
<s> it certainly rhymed with her <\s>
<s> rhythm thronged his head words jostled to be joined together he was on the verge of a poem <\s>

<s> in a corner stood a large globe of that world never visited by timothy deeply convinced of the unreality of everything but england and permanently upset by the sea on which he had been very sick one sunday afternoon in 1836 out of a pleasure boat off the pier at brighton with juley and hester swithin and hatty chessman all due to swithin who was always taking things into his head and who thank goodness had been sick too <\s>
<s> soames knew all about it having heard the tale fifty times at least from one or other of them <\s>
<s> he went up to the globe and gave it a spin it emitted a faint creak and moved about an inch bringing into his purview a daddy long legs which had died on it in latitude 44 <\s>
<s> and he went out and up the stairs <\s>
<s> on the half landing he stopped before the case of stuffed humming birds which had delighted his childhood <\s>
<s> they looked not a day older suspended on wires above pampas grass <\s>
<s> if the case were opened the birds would not begin to hum but the whole thing would crumble he suspected <\s>
<s> it wouldn't be worth putting that into the sale <\s>
<s> and suddenly he was caught by a memory of aunt ann dear old aunt ann holding him by the hand in front of that case and saying look soamey <\s>
<s> aren't they bright and pretty dear little humming birds <\s>
<s> soames remembered his own answer they don't hum auntie <\s>
<s> he must have been six in a black velveteen suit with a light blue collar he remembered that suit well <\s>
<s> aunt ann with her ringlets and her spidery kind hands and her grave old aquiline smile a fine old lady aunt ann <\s>
<s> he moved on up to the drawing room door <\s>
<s> there on each side of it were the groups of miniatures <\s>
<s> those he would certainly buy in <\s>
<s> the miniatures of his four aunts one of his uncle swithin adolescent and one of his uncle nicholas as a boy <\s>
<s> they had all been painted by a young lady friend of the family at a time 1830 about when miniatures were considered very genteel and lasting too painted as they were on ivory <\s>
<s> many a time had he heard the tale of that young lady very talented my dear she had quite a weakness for swithin and very soon after she went into a consumption and died so like keats we often spoke of it <\s>
<s> well there they were <\s>
<s> ann juley hester susan quite a small child swithin with sky blue eyes pink cheeks yellow curls white waistcoat large as life and nicholas like cupid with an eye on heaven <\s>
<s> now he came to think of it uncle nick had always been rather like that a wonderful man to the last <\s>
<s> yes she must have had talent and miniatures always had a certain back watered cachet of their own little subject to the currents of competition on aesthetic change <\s>
<s> soames opened the drawing room door <\s>
<s> the room was dusted the furniture uncovered the curtains drawn back precisely as if his aunts still dwelt there patiently waiting <\s>
<s> and a thought came to him when timothy died why not <\s>
<s> would it not be almost a duty to preserve this house like carlyle's and put up a tablet and show it <\s>
<s> specimen of mid victorian abode entrance one shilling with catalogue <\s>
<s> after all it was the completest thing and perhaps the deadest in the london of to day <\s>
<s> and the more he thought of that handkerchief the more amazing his luck seemed <\s>
<s> it certainly rhymed with her <\s>
<s> rhythm thronged his head words jostled to be joined together he was on the verge of a poem <\s>
<s> jon remained in this condition for more than half an hour then returned to the house and getting a ladder climbed in at his bedroom window out of sheer exhilaration <\s>
<s> then remembering that the study window was open he went down and shut it first removing the ladder so as to obliterate all traces of his feeling <\s>
<s> the thing was too deep to be revealed to mortal soul even to his mother <\s>
<s> iv the mausoleum there are houses whose souls have passed into the limbo of time leaving their bodies in the limbo of london <\s>
<s> such was not quite the condition of timothy's on the bayswater road for timothy's soul still had one foot in timothy forsyte's body and smither kept the atmosphere unchanging of camphor and port wine and house whose windows are only opened to air it twice a day <\s>
<s> to forsyte imagination that house was now a sort of chinese pill box a series of layers in the last of which was timothy <\s>
<s> one did not reach him or so it was reported by members of the family who out of old time habit or absentmindedness would drive up once in a blue moon and ask after their surviving uncle <\s>
<s> such were francie now quite emancipated from god she frankly avowed atheism euphemia emancipated from old nicholas and winifred dartie from her man of the world <\s>
<s> but after all everybody was emancipated now or said they were perhaps not quite the same thing <\s>
<s> when soames therefore took it on his way to paddington station on the morning after that encounter it was hardly with the expectation of seeing timothy in the flesh <\s>
<s> his heart made a faint demonstration within him while he stood in full south sunlight on the newly whitened doorstep of that little house where four forsytes had once lived and now but one dwelt on like a winter fly the house into which soames had come and out of which he had gone times without number divested of or burdened with fardels of family gossip the house of the old people of another century another age <\s>
<s> the sight of smither still corseted up to the armpits because the new fashion which came in as they were going out about 1903 had never been considered nice by aunts juley and hester brought a pale friendliness to soames lips smither still faithfully arranged to old pattern in every detail an invaluable servant none such left smiling back at him with the words why <\s>
<s> soames after all this time <\s>
<s> and how are you sir <\s>
<s> timothy will be so pleased to know you've been <\s>
<s> he keeps fairly bobbish for his age sir but of course he's a wonderful man <\s>
<s> as i said to mrs <\s>
<s> dartie when she was here last it would please miss forsyte and mrs <\s>
<s> juley and miss hester to see how he relishes a baked apple still <\s>
<s> but he's quite deaf <\s>
<s> and a mercy i always think <\s>
<s> for what we should have done with him in the air raids i don't know <\s>
<s> what did you do with him <\s>
<s> we just left him in his bed and had the bell run down into the cellar so that cook and i could hear him if he rang <\s>
<s> it would never have done to let him know there was a war on <\s>
<s> as i said to cook if mr <\s>
<s> timothy rings they may do what they like i'm going up <\s>
<s> my dear mistresses would have a fit if they could see him ringing and nobody going to him <\s>
<s> but he slept through them all beautiful <\s>
<s> and the one in the daytime he was having his bath <\s>
<s> it was a mercy because he might have noticed the people in the street all looking up he often looks out of the window <\s>
<s> smither was getting garrulous <\s>
<s> i just want to look round and see if there's anything to be done <\s>
<s> i don't think there's anything except a smell of mice in the dining room that we don't know how to get rid of <\s>
<s> it's funny they should be there and not a crumb since mr <\s>
<s> timothy took to not coming down just before the war <\s>
<s> but they're nasty little things you never know where they'll take you next <\s>
<s> does he leave his bed oh <\s>
<s> yes sir he takes nice exercise between his bed and the window in the morning not to risk a change of air <\s>
<s> and he's quite comfortable in himself has his will out every day regular <\s>
<s> it's a great consolation to him that <\s>
<s> well smither i want to see him if i can in case he has anything to say to me <\s>
<s> smither coloured up above her corsets <\s>
<s> it will be an occasion <\s>
<s> shall i take you round the house sir while i send cook to break it to him <\s>
<s> no you go to him said soames <\s>
<s> i can go round the house by myself <\s>
<s> one could not confess to sentiment before another and soames felt that he was going to be sentimental nosing round those rooms so saturated with the past <\s>
<s> when smither creaking with excitement had left him soames entered the dining room and sniffed <\s>
<s> in his opinion it wasn't mice but incipient wood rot and he examined the panelling <\s>
<s> whether it was worth a coat of paint at timothy's age he was not sure <\s>
<s> the room had always been the most modern in the house and only a faint smile curled soames lips and nostrils <\s>
<s> walls of a rich green surmounted the oak dado a heavy metal chandelier hung by a chain from a ceiling divided by imitation beams <\s>
<s> the pictures had been bought by timothy a bargain one day at jobson's sixty years ago three snyder still lifes two faintly coloured drawings of a boy and a girl rather charming which bore the initials j <\s>
<s> r timothy had always believed they might turn out to be joshua reynolds but soames who admired them had discovered that they were only john robinson and a doubtful morland of a white pony being shod <\s>
<s> deep red plush curtains ten high backed dark mahogany chairs with deep red plush seats a turkey carpet and a mahogany dining table as large as the room was small such was an apartment which soames could remember unchanged in soul or body since he was four years old <\s>
<s> he looked especially at the two drawings and thought i shall buy those at the sale <\s>
<s> from the dining room he passed into timothy's study <\s>
<s> he did not remember ever having been in that room <\s>
<s> it was lined from floor to ceiling with volumes and he looked at them with curiosity <\s>
<s> one wall seemed devoted to educational books which timothy's firm had published two generations back sometimes as many as twenty copies of one book <\s>
<s> soames read their titles and shuddered <\s>
<s> the middle wall had precisely the same books as used to be in the library at his own father's in park lane from which he deduced the fancy that james and his youngest brother had gone out together one day and bought a brace of small libraries <\s>
<s> the third wall he approached with more excitement <\s>
<s> here surely timothy's own taste would be found <\s>
<s> the books were dummies <\s>
<s> the fourth wall was all heavily curtained window <\s>

<s> i just want to look round and see if there's anything to be done <\s>
<s> i don't think there's anything except a smell of mice in the dining room that we don't know how to get rid of <\s>
<s> it's funny they should be there and not a crumb since mr <\s>
<s> timothy took to not coming down just before the war <\s>
<s> but they're nasty little things you never know where they'll take you next <\s>
<s> does he leave his bed oh <\s>
<s> yes sir he takes nice exercise between his bed and the window in the morning not to risk a change of air <\s>
<s> and he's quite comfortable in himself has his will out every day regular <\s>
<s> it's a great consolation to him that <\s>
<s> well smither i want to see him if i can in case he has anything to say to me <\s>
<s> smither coloured up above her corsets <\s>
<s> it will be an occasion <\s>
<s> shall i take you round the house sir while i send cook to break it to him <\s>
<s> no you go to him said soames <\s>
<s> i can go round the house by myself <\s>
<s> one could not confess to sentiment before another and soames felt that he was going to be sentimental nosing round those rooms so saturated with the past <\s>
<s> when smither creaking with excitement had left him soames entered the dining room and sniffed <\s>
<s> in his opinion it wasn't mice but incipient wood rot and he examined the panelling <\s>
<s> whether it was worth a coat of paint at timothy's age he was not sure <\s>
<s> the room had always been the most modern in the house and only a faint smile curled soames lips and nostrils <\s>
<s> walls of a rich green surmounted the oak dado a heavy metal chandelier hung by a chain from a ceiling divided by imitation beams <\s>
<s> the pictures had been bought by timothy a bargain one day at jobson's sixty years ago three snyder still lifes two faintly coloured drawings of a boy and a girl rather charming which bore the initials j <\s>
<s> r timothy had always believed they might turn out to be joshua reynolds but soames who admired them had discovered that they were only john robinson and a doubtful morland of a white pony being shod <\s>
<s> deep red plush curtains ten high backed dark mahogany chairs with deep red plush seats a turkey carpet and a mahogany dining table as large as the room was small such was an apartment which soames could remember unchanged in soul or body since he was four years old <\s>
<s> he looked especially at the two drawings and thought i shall buy those at the sale <\s>
<s> from the dining room he passed into timothy's study <\s>
<s> he did not remember ever having been in that room <\s>
<s> it was lined from floor to ceiling with volumes and he looked at them with curiosity <\s>
<s> one wall seemed devoted to educational books which timothy's firm had published two generations back sometimes as many as twenty copies of one book <\s>
<s> soames read their titles and shuddered <\s>
<s> the middle wall had precisely the same books as used to be in the library at his own father's in park lane from which he deduced the fancy that james and his youngest brother had gone out together one day and bought a brace of small libraries <\s>
<s> the third wall he approached with more excitement <\s>
<s> here surely timothy's own taste would be found <\s>
<s> the books were dummies <\s>
<s> the fourth wall was all heavily curtained window <\s>
<s> and turned toward it was a large chair with a mahogany reading stand attached on which a yellowish and folded copy of the times dated july 6 1914 the day timothy first failed to come down as if in preparation for the war seemed waiting for him still <\s>
<s> in a corner stood a large globe of that world never visited by timothy deeply convinced of the unreality of everything but england and permanently upset by the sea on which he had been very sick one sunday afternoon in 1836 out of a pleasure boat off the pier at brighton with juley and hester swithin and hatty chessman all due to swithin who was always taking things into his head and who thank goodness had been sick too <\s>
<s> soames knew all about it having heard the tale fifty times at least from one or other of them <\s>
<s> he went up to the globe and gave it a spin it emitted a faint creak and moved about an inch bringing into his purview a daddy long legs which had died on it in latitude 44 <\s>
<s> and he went out and up the stairs <\s>
<s> on the half landing he stopped before the case of stuffed humming birds which had delighted his childhood <\s>
<s> they looked not a day older suspended on wires above pampas grass <\s>
<s> if the case were opened the birds would not begin to hum but the whole thing would crumble he suspected <\s>
<s> it wouldn't be worth putting that into the sale <\s>
<s> and suddenly he was caught by a memory of aunt ann dear old aunt ann holding him by the hand in front of that case and saying look soamey <\s>
<s> aren't they bright and pretty dear little humming birds <\s>
<s> soames remembered his own answer they don't hum auntie <\s>
<s> he must have been six in a black velveteen suit with a light blue collar he remembered that suit well <\s>
<s> aunt ann with her ringlets and her spidery kind hands and her grave old aquiline smile a fine old lady aunt ann <\s>
<s> he moved on up to the drawing room door <\s>
<s> there on each side of it were the groups of miniatures <\s>
<s> those he would certainly buy in <\s>
<s> the miniatures of his four aunts one of his uncle swithin adolescent and one of his uncle nicholas as a boy <\s>
<s> they had all been painted by a young lady friend of the family at a time 1830 about when miniatures were considered very genteel and lasting too painted as they were on ivory <\s>
<s> many a time had he heard the tale of that young lady very talented my dear she had quite a weakness for swithin and very soon after she went into a consumption and died so like keats we often spoke of it <\s>
<s> well there they were <\s>
<s> ann juley hester susan quite a small child swithin with sky blue eyes pink cheeks yellow curls white waistcoat large as life and nicholas like cupid with an eye on heaven <\s>
<s> now he came to think of it uncle nick had always been rather like that a wonderful man to the last <\s>
<s> yes she must have had talent and miniatures always had a certain back watered cachet of their own little subject to the currents of competition on aesthetic change <\s>
<s> soames opened the drawing room door <\s>
<s> the room was dusted the furniture uncovered the curtains drawn back precisely as if his aunts still dwelt there patiently waiting <\s>
<s> and a thought came to him when timothy died why not <\s>
<s> would it not be almost a duty to preserve this house like carlyle's and put up a tablet and show it <\s>
<s> specimen of mid victorian abode entrance one shilling with catalogue <\s>
<s> after all it was the completest thing and perhaps the deadest in the london of to day <\s>
<s> and the more he thought of that handkerchief the more amazing his luck seemed <\s>
<s> it certainly rhymed with her <\s>
<s> rhythm thronged his head words jostled to be joined together he was on the verge of a poem <\s>
<s> jon remained in this condition for more than half an hour then returned to the house and getting a ladder climbed in at his bedroom window out of sheer exhilaration <\s>
<s> then remembering that the study window was open he went down and shut it first removing the ladder so as to obliterate all traces of his feeling <\s>
<s> the thing was too deep to be revealed to mortal soul even to his mother <\s>
<s> iv the mausoleum there are houses whose souls have passed into the limbo of time leaving their bodies in the limbo of london <\s>
<s> such was not quite the condition of timothy's on the bayswater road for timothy's soul still had one foot in timothy forsyte's body and smither kept the atmosphere unchanging of camphor and port wine and house whose windows are only opened to air it twice a day <\s>
<s> to forsyte imagination that house was now a sort of chinese pill box a series of layers in the last of which was timothy <\s>
<s> one did not reach him or so it was reported by members of the family who out of old time habit or absentmindedness would drive up once in a blue moon and ask after their surviving uncle <\s>
<s> such were francie now quite emancipated from god she frankly avowed atheism euphemia emancipated from old nicholas and winifred dartie from her man of the world <\s>
<s> but after all everybody was emancipated now or said they were perhaps not quite the same thing <\s>
<s> when soames therefore took it on his way to paddington station on the morning after that encounter it was hardly with the expectation of seeing timothy in the flesh <\s>
<s> his heart made a faint demonstration within him while he stood in full south sunlight on the newly whitened doorstep of that little house where four forsytes had once lived and now but one dwelt on like a winter fly the house into which soames had come and out of which he had gone times without number divested of or burdened with fardels of family gossip the house of the old people of another century another age <\s>
<s> the sight of smither still corseted up to the armpits because the new fashion which came in as they were going out about 1903 had never been considered nice by aunts juley and hester brought a pale friendliness to soames lips smither still faithfully arranged to old pattern in every detail an invaluable servant none such left smiling back at him with the words why <\s>
<s> soames after all this time <\s>
<s> and how are you sir <\s>
<s> timothy will be so pleased to know you've been <\s>
<s> he keeps fairly bobbish for his age sir but of course he's a wonderful man <\s>
<s> as i said to mrs <\s>
<s> dartie when she was here last it would please miss forsyte and mrs <\s>
<s> juley and miss hester to see how he relishes a baked apple still <\s>
<s> but he's quite deaf <\s>
<s> and a mercy i always think <\s>
<s> for what we should have done with him in the air raids i don't know <\s>
<s> what did you do with him <\s>
<s> we just left him in his bed and had the bell run down into the cellar so that cook and i could hear him if he rang <\s>
<s> it would never have done to let him know there was a war on <\s>
<s> as i said to cook if mr <\s>
<s> timothy rings they may do what they like i'm going up <\s>
